metadata.title: USN-5066-1 -- PySAML2 vulnerability
metadata.description: Brian Wolff discovered that PySAML2 incorrectly validated cryptographic signatures. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to alter SAML documents.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5066-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-pysaml2-doc - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.2 python-pysaml2 - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.2 python3-pysaml2 - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.2 No subscription required
